title: Permanently Banned

replies.body: After looking over your history of punishments, it actually looks like this account was able to receive *more* warnings than normal. With that being said, certain words being detected can flag your account to a permaban regardless of where your current standing is. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we're more than happy to provide all the context necessary for why this account was banned.
and the reason why i dont read the warnings is only because im not pretty good at english so i cant understand lot of words

then put your game in your native language, if for whatever reason, your language isnt supported, try to get it supported by submitting a ticket, you cant blame not being able to read warning for the reason of being toxic. You were able to digest what broporo said, so why not the multiple warnings on your account. sadly, but once you are banned, make another account and move on not being toxic.
i cant say anthing else just im sad for my self

sorry for spamming but i got 2 ban for chat 14 games 16 didnt remember and i dont except it for so serious reason to take permant ban just let me a chance more swear to follow all of the rules in continue
and yea i forgot to say much of this chat was just for joke but i can stop it

so what can i do now? i will do anything to take it back just i know i been toxic just im  gonna change only for my account next ban close it forever just i need only one chance i dont write before the warnigs and  im sorry and i swear to mute everyone from begin to be more careful
just that money is much for me so i can do anything to take it back
Permanent bans, if Riot deems them justified, will NEVER get revoked.

and for real my first account scammed and after all... i try to make a new one i give my fvcking life to this account and now permant for this shit? and what u mean i do it so far? i got only one ban for 14 days it ends today and i got again a new one? do  you watch the games before you ban someone? go check it out and tell me what did i say wrong?
